page.title: 01CARNFORTH AREA GAZETTEER
page.content: This area, including{Carnforth, {Bolton-le-Sands}and{Nether Kellet}is situated on the southern shore of {Morecambe Bay.}Bordered by sea and salt flats to the west, limestone hills to the north, the{Vale of Lune } to the east and{Lancaster}to the south it is within easy reach of some of the {most beautiful country in the North {West,}within 30 mins drive of the{Lake {District}and offers marvellous views across the bay, especially at sunset. Mentioned in the first{Domesday Book the area is steeped in history, but does not live in the past. Even though some industries have closed new ones {(Nuclear Power and Off-Shore Gas)}have taken their place & domestic building continues to grow. Close to the{M5}and {main rail routes}it is within easy reach of northern towns and cities and is a popular{holiday area.}
